REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to exempting the Niagara frontier transit authority (NFTA) from bond issuance charges
Summary: Relates to exempting the Niagara Frontier Transit Authority from bond issuance charges.
LawCode: Amd ยง2976, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to exempting the Niagara frontier transportation authority from bond issuance charges
